posts.post_title: T206 Cobb bat off PSA 2 For sale
posts.post_content:
T206 Ty Cobb bat off PSA 2 for sale. Looke like a four or five. Downgraded due to a slight scuff on the reverse. Price-$1,200. Emails only. NO PMs [url]edhans@monkberry.com[/url] . Checks or money orders only. No PayPal.

Please check my updated website: 
[URL="http://t206.monkberry.com/index.html"]http://t206.monkberry.com/index.html[/URL]

10% off plus free shipping until January 15th.

[IMG]http://www.monkberry.com/~edhans/t206cobb.jpg[/IMG]
Wow, beautiful card. Good luck with the sale. Wish I had an extra $1200 sitting around.
